ಶೀತಲ ಸಮರದ ಎರಡು ಬಣಗಳು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಅಮೆರಿಕಾ ಮತ್ತು ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4996"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5007"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:9604"},{"text":"

ಅಮೆರಿಕಾ ಮತ್ತು ರಷ್ಯಾ
